attributes.action: Boardies to give everyone who paid for tickets for 2019, free entry to BM 2020.
attributes.background: Boardmasters 2019 was cancelled at 11:30pm the day before it was supposed to be going ahead, leaving 50,000 + people upset out of money and angry. The catastrophic ‘storm’ just turned out to be a bit of rain. Give us free tickets to boardies 2020 and you might redeem yourselves x
